/usr/local/gcc-arm-linux-gnueabihf/bin/arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++  -L /home/work/sourcecode/openglES/camera/lib/libGLES -L /home/work/sourcecode/openglES/camera/lib/libopencv -L /home/work/sourcecode/openglES/camera/lib/libcamera  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/openglES-arm.dir/src/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/openglES-arm.dir/src/draw.cpp.o CMakeFiles/openglES-arm.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/openglES-arm.dir/src/window.cpp.o  -o openglES-arm -lEGL -lGLESv2 -lGLESv1_CM -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_videoio -lopencv_core -lopencv_imgcodecs -lopencv_imgproc -lcamera -lpthread -lva -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswresample
